articles.title: 10 signs of magnesium deficiency - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Magnesium aids in muscle and nerve function promotes a healthy heart rhythm and contributes to bone strength by regulating calcium levels. It helps to regulate blood sugar levels, supports energy metabolism, and plays a role in maintaining optimal blood pres…
articles.content: Magnesium deficiency often manifests as frequent muscle cramps, particularly in the calves, feet, or hands, due to impaired muscle function.
